objects.text:
• Premium ribbed white bolero cardigan with delicate crochet pattern
• Intricate floral embroidered trim with adjustable ribbon closure
• Soft, breathable cotton blend ideal for spring/summer wear
• Perfect for casual outings, photoshoots, or special occasions

product_details.name: Elegant White Crochet Crop Top Set - Vintage-Inspired Summer Collection
product_details.description:
• Premium ribbed white long-sleeve bolero cardigan for layered styling
• Delicate crochet crop top with intricate lace pattern detailing
• Charming floral embroidered trim with multi-colored accents
• Front tie closure with adjustable ribbon for custom fit
• Soft, breathable cotton blend material ideal for spring/summer wear
• Romantic vintage-inspired design perfect for cottagecore aesthetic
• Versatile two-piece set can be styled separately or together
• Available in pristine white for timeless elegance
• Decorative hair accessory included for complete styling
• Perfect for casual outings, photoshoots, or special occasions

banner_details:
This elegant fashion-themed banner has a vintage aesthetic that emphasizes softness and femininity. The background ("background") features a radial gradient with subtle abstract shapes and floral motifs in very light pink and beige tones to create a delicate texture. At the top center, a bold serif text layer ("heading") announces the product name in a muted rose red color, with a smaller uppercase subheading ("subheading") just beneath it introducing the seasonal theme in a matching yet slightly warmer tone.

The centered product image ("product_image") shows a model wearing the featured outfit, seamlessly blended into the background. Below her, a paragraph-style description ("description") in a darker brownish-red font highlights key product details with bullet points for easy readability.

A clear and bold price tag ("price") in a deep muted burgundy stands out just above the call-to-action. The CTA ("cta_background" and "cta") is a rectangular button in the same burgundy color, featuring white bold uppercase text encouraging users to shop.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Nude Pink: `#F8F0E5`
- Light Beige: `#F5EAE0`
- Muted Rose Red: `#9D5353`
- Warm Mauve: `#A87C7C`
- Rich Brownish Red: `#5E3F3F`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a soft, feminine aesthetic dominated by creamy whites and natural tones. The primary color is an elegant ivory (#F6F3EE), seen in the crocheted top and skirt, exuding purity and calmness. A subtle cool white (#F9F9F9) runs through the sheer cardigan, adding a clean and fresh layer. Accents of warm skin tone (#D8B49C) and brown hair (#4B2E1F) lend contrast and warmth. Small floral embellishments introduce soft pastel hues like dusty blue (#A3B7C8), muted red (#C37A74), and beige (#E3C9A8), offering visual interest. These colors blend seamlessly while the delicate textures and varied tones let each one subtly stand out.
